doc.title: Icon Men: Julien Greaux - Upper Body Workout
doc.plot: Julien Greaux's Personal and Private Workout - an Awe Inspiring Upper Body Circuit Training Routine! This handsome Fitness Cover Model teaches you his secrets to a picture perfect body. He instructs you step by step through his super charged workout of muscular endurance. This DVD shows the very chest, bicep, triceps, shoulder and ab routine he uses to sculpt his own magnificent physique. His routine teaches you how he works out each one of his cut and ripped muscles to their maximum pump! Julien Is Cut and Super Defined... and Now You Can Be Too! Also included: Julien's display of his martial arts prowess and a behind the scenes look at one of his fitness photo shoots. Approximately 40 minutes long and captured in glorious digital detail.
